verses.verse: So <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And these were the <S%H8269>princes<s%> which he had; <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, priest: or, chief officer

<S%H456>Elihoreph<s%> and <S%H281>Ahiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7894>Shisha<s%>, <S%H5608>scribes<s%>; <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud<s%>, the <S%H2142>recorder<s%>. scribes: or, secretaries recorder: or, remembrancer
And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> was over the <S%H6635>host<s%>: and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> were the <S%H3548>priests<s%>:

And <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> was over the <S%H5324>officers<s%>: and <S%H2071>Zabud<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> was principal <S%H3548>officer<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H7463>friend<s%>:
And <S%H301>Ahishar<s%> was over the <S%H1004>household<s%>: and <S%H141>Adoniram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5653>Abda<s%> was over the <S%H4522>tribute<s%>. tribute: or, levy

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5324>officers<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which provided <S%H3557>victuals<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H1004>household<s%>: each <S%H259>man<s%> his <S%H2320>month<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> made <S%H3557>provision<s%>.
And these are their <S%H8034>names<s%>: The son of <S%H1133>Hur<s%>, in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>: The son: or, Benhur
The son of <S%H1128>Dekar<s%> <S%H1857><s%>, in <S%H4739>Makaz<s%>, and in <S%H8169>Shaalbim<s%>, and <S%H1053>Bethshemesh<s%>, and <S%H358>Elonbethhanan<s%>: The son: or, Ben Dekar
The son of <S%H1136>Hesed<s%> <S%H2618><s%>, in <S%H700>Aruboth<s%>; to him pertained <S%H7755>Sochoh<s%>, and all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%>: The son: or, Ben Heseb

The son of <S%H1125>Abinadab<s%>, in all the <S%H5299>region<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%>; which had <S%H2955>Taphath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>: The son: or, Bena Binadab

<S%H1195>Baana<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud<s%>; to him pertained <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%>, and all <S%H1052>Bethshean<s%>, which is <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H6891>Zartanah<s%> beneath <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>, from <S%H1052>Bethshean<s%> to <S%H65>Abelmeholah<s%>, even unto the place that is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3361>Jokneam<s%>:

The son of <S%H1127>Geber<s%>, in <S%H1568>Ramothgilead<s%> <S%H7433><s%>; to him pertained the <S%H2333>towns<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, which are in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>; to him also pertained the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob<s%>, which is in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with <S%H2346>walls<s%> and <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%>: The son: or, Ben Geber
<S%H292>Ahinadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo<s%> had <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%>: Mahanaim: or, to Mahanaim
<S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> was in <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>; he also <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1315>Basmath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>:
<S%H1195>Baanah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> was in <S%H836>Asher<s%> and in <S%H1175>Aloth<s%>:
<S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6515>Paruah<s%>, in <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>:
<S%H8096>Shimei<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H414>Elah<s%>, in <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>:

<S%H1398>Geber<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri<s%> was in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>; and he was the <S%H259>only<s%> <S%H5333>officer<s%> which was in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H7227>many<s%>, as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> which is by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> in <S%H7230>multitude<s%>, <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%>, and making <S%H8056>merry<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4910>reigned<s%> over all <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> from the <S%H5104>river<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: they <S%H5066>brought<s%> <S%H4503>presents<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H3899>provision<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>, and <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%>, provision: Heb. bread measures: Heb. cors

<S%H6235>Ten<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> out of the <S%H7471>pastures<s%>, and an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, beside <S%H354>harts<s%>, and <S%H6643>roebucks<s%>, and <S%H3180>fallowdeer<s%>, and <S%H75>fatted<s%> <S%H1257>fowl<s%>.

For he had <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over all the region on this <S%H5676>side<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%>, from <S%H8607>Tiphsah<s%> even to <S%H5804>Azzah<s%>, over all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%>: and he had <S%H7965>peace<s%> on all <S%H5650>sides<s%> <S%H5676><s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> him.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> under his <S%H1612>vine<s%> and under his fig <S%H8384>tree<s%>, from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beersheba<s%>, all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>. safely: Heb. confidently

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H723>stalls<s%> of <S%H5483>horses<s%> for his <S%H4817>chariots<s%>, and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>.

And those <S%H5324>officers<s%> provided <S%H3557>victual<s%> for <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and for all that <S%H7131>came<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H7979>table<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H2320>month<s%>: they <S%H5737>lacked<s%> <S%H1697>nothing<s%>.

<S%H8184>Barley<s%> also and <S%H8401>straw<s%> for the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7409>dromedaries<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> they unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the officers were, every <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H4941>charge<s%>. dromedaries: or, mules, or, swift beasts

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%>, and <S%H7341>largeness<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>, even as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> that is on the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>shore<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H7235>excelled<s%> the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the east <S%H6924>country<s%>, and all the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

For he was <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than all <S%H120>men<s%>; than <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H250>Ezrahite<s%>, and <S%H1968>Heman<s%>, and <S%H3633>Chalcol<s%>, and <S%H1862>Darda<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4235>Mahol<s%>: and his <S%H8034>fame<s%> was in all <S%H1471>nations<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.
And he <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H4912>proverbs<s%>: and his <S%H7892>songs<s%> were a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%>.

And he <S%H1696>spake<s%> of <S%H6086>trees<s%>, from the cedar <S%H730>tree<s%> that is in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> even unto the <S%H231>hyssop<s%> that springeth <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H7023>wall<s%>: he <S%H1696>spake<s%> also of <S%H929>beasts<s%>, and of <S%H5775>fowl<s%>, and of creeping <S%H7431>things<s%>, and of <S%H1709>fishes<s%>.

And there <S%H935>came<s%> of all <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, from all <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, which had <S%H8085>heard<s%> of his <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
